scan_linter_check.description: When using setValue() on a reference field, be sure to include the display value with the value (sys_id). If you set the value without the display value, ServiceNow does a synchronous Ajax call to retrieve the display value for the record you specified. This extra round trip to the server can leave you at risk of performance issues.
scan_linter_check.name: Using setValue()'s displayValue Parameter with Reference Fields
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: Using the third parameter, where display name of the reference record can be passed.
